revised_title: Conversion of Mixture of Dephlogisticated and Phlogisticated Air into Nitrous Acid
tldr: Henry Cavendish investigates the conversion of a mixture of dephlogisticated and phlogisticated air into nitrous acid using an electric spark. The experiment confirms that the mixture of airs is converted into nitrous acid, but the experiment is continued for too long, resulting in a greater quantity of air absorbed and the acid produced being insufficient to saturate the soap-lees.
